PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\Forms
namespace
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\Forms
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\Forms\UIOption

Represents an option form object

Information
Extends

PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIWidget

Options

This widget accepts the following options:

value

an optional value attribute

id

an optional id attribute

option

the displayed option

other

an optional attribute to add verbatium
